Package io.clonecloudstore.common.database.utils

Interface RepositoryBaseInterface<E>

Type Parameters:
E - The Type used by this Repository
All Known Subinterfaces:
DaoAccessorBucketRepository, DaoAccessorObjectRepository, DaoNativeListingRepository, DaoRequestRepository, DaoSitesActionRepository, DaoSitesListingRepository, DaoTopologyRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
ExtendedPanacheMongoRepositoryBase, ExtendedPanacheRepositoryBase, MgDaoAccessorBucketRepository, MgDaoAccessorObjectRepository, MgDaoNativeListingRepository, MgDaoRequestRepository, MgDaoSitesActionRepository, MgDaoSitesListingRepository, MgDaoTopologyRepository
public interface RepositoryBaseInterface<E>
Interface for Repository for a Database
